channel.title: Doors disappearing when opening/closing. [VIDEO]
channel.description: Hello all, I am using NOOBSCAPEV3. I am having a problem when opening/closing doors. The first couple times the doors will open and close properly. But if I am outside of a building and then go inside and close the door, the door just disappears and becomes an invisible wall. It doesn't let me through it. This seems to be happening randomly upon opening/closing doors. Has anyone ever had this problem before? I can make a video if it will help. Please someone help me with this I have been stumped by this for so long its haulting my whole project I am making for me and my friends :(. Thank you very much!

[quote=“Zach Knight, post:9, topic:551918”][quote author=th4don link=topic=670831.msg4498529#msg4498529 date=1446997071]
check doors.xml it has all of the open/closed doors in it… must have something to do with that.
[/quote]
It doesn’t.[/quote]

Thanks for bringing this back up. I completely gave up on my project due to this glitch/bug. Do you know if there is a fix? Do you know the fix?
Thank you very much!

item.title: Doors disappearing when opening/closing. [VIDEO]
item.dc:creator: @xphene28 xphene28
item.description:
@xphene28 wrote:

No it happens at every door/gate in the game. Anything that opens and closes. Even manholes.

It seems to be happening completely randomly. I been trying but cannot find any pattern or whats causing this. Im surprised im the only one thats ever had this problem with noobscape?

It happens when i stand still or click open/close from a distance.

Insert at least you tried meme here

Read full topic

It looks like the event happened once your player stopped his movement event and did the object event can you verify it happens only there? Or does it happen when you also stand still.

item.title: Doors disappearing when opening/closing. [VIDEO]
item.dc:creator: @xphene28 xphene28
item.description:
@xphene28 wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:4, topic:551918”][quote author=xphene28 link=topic=670831.msg4485980#msg4485980 date=1434002604]
https://youtu.be/dbOrCB0Qxf8

Here is the video. Still not solved :(. Any help would be appreciated!
[/quote]

When you logout and log back in does it reappear im trying to find out if this is client sided or server sided to point you in the right direction. My guess is it may be server sided with removing the object and replacing it.[/quote]

No it does not reappear unless i completely shutdown AND close the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Doors disappearing when opening/closing. [VIDEO]
item.dc:creator: @xphene28 xphene28
item.description:
@xphene28 wrote:

Hello all,
I am using NOOBSCAPEV3. I am having a problem when opening/closing doors. The first couple times the doors will open and close properly. But if I am outside of a building and then go inside and close the door, the door just disappears and becomes an invisible wall. It doesn’t let me through it. This seems to be happening randomly upon opening/closing doors.
Has anyone ever had this problem before? I can make a video if it will help.
Please someone help me with this I have been stumped by this for so long its haulting my whole project I am making for me and my friends :(.
Thank you very much!

Read full topic
